statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); input_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens'); output_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens'); context_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size'); total_tokens=$((input_tokens + output_tokens)); usage_pct=$((total_tokens * 100 / context_size)); total_k=$((total_tokens / 1000)); context_k=$((context_size / 1000)); if [ -d "$project_dir/.git" ]; then branch=$(cd "$project_dir" && git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=$(printf " \033[35m(\033[36m%s\033[35m)\033[0m" "$branch"); else git_info=""; fi; else git_info=""; fi; if [ "$cwd" = "$project_dir" ]; then display_dir="~"; else display_dir=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$project_dir/|~/|" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); fi; printf "\033[34m%s\033[0m%s | \033[33m%dk/%dk tokens (%d%%)\033[0m" "$display_dir" "$git_info" "$total_k" "$context_k" "$usage_pct"
